1.content:
this will be the ONLY non realistic question
who are you
1.title: the ONLY non realistic question

choices: go back to sleap and wait for him to wake
11.content: You are toothless, a night fury with a missing fin replaced with a mechanism made by one of the humans with which you once raged war with. The sun is just rising and as you wake you notice that hiccup is still sleeping.
11.title: toothless

12.content: is this after another fan fic?
12.title: hiccup

122.content:
after being "banished" from berk you and toothless landed on the neerby south meathead island at pointy point and now both you and toothless can be completly human and completly night fury, you transform into a human and get into some of the clothes that you brought with you and then purly out of curiosity you say

"ok you drank my blood, show me your human form"

complying toothless shrinks and looses his scales and becomes human and removes the flying gear hanging loosly around him and you hand him a black bearskin vest, dark grey shirt black boots and brown trowsers from your pack so that he could cover himself, he looked about your age but he was paler and shorter than you with black hair.

"hmmm... not bad"

"yeah i.. oh"

"what?"

"i just realised what it was like to have human teeth... its wierd"

"so thats the biggest change for you"

"yep"

"so what about this place? a good start for our continued humandragon alience?"

"sure but we should go as...
122.title: blood of a night fury

choices: defeat my son in a duel
settle the dispute of my people
1221.content:
"if they are not alied with dragons then they wont trust them and us aproaching as humans is safest"

so they walked north through the heather until the wooden fortified village came into veiw

"this shouldnt be too hard after all the meat heads and the hooligans have always been alies"

cheif mogadon was having a bad day half his peple wanted an aliance with dragons and half didnt and if he didnt do something he would have a cival war on his hands what he needed was a hero tht would convince the village one way or another so when his messengers told him that two kids wanted to see him h wasnt intrested but he couldnt just give a flat no because that would loose him the favour of his people so he thought as hard as his tiny cheif brain could and said

"they must earn a chance to see me, they can see me if one of them can..
1221.title: both humans

12211.content:
mogadons son was thuggary he was older, bigger, stronger and a lot smarter than snotlout he had a grey monsterous nightmare with red markings he fought with a double headed axe and his sheild was painted with a dragons head wearing a crown of gold hilted swords he also colected the fire gas from his nightmare and used it to make fire grenades for use in fights.

"long time no see thuggary" said hiccup, they had met before at the thing which was a meeting of the viking cheifs and their heirs and whilst thuggary respected hiccups inteligence he knew that he wasnt exactly duelist material

"so fists or axes"
12211.title: defeat my son in a duel

choices: they suspect him t be a god or something
122112.content:
"i choose axes" hiccup said knowing that if he wanted to win peoples favour then he would have to be impressive so he quickly added some unseen abilitys like skin fireproofing, dragon muscels and dragon senses he picked up the sword from is pack with his right hand as usual and a sheild and the two started dueling hiccup was stronger due to his dragon muscels but thuggary was clearly more skilled and was able to cut him here and there and this continued for about five minuets and thuggary began to get angry that hiccup could be this strong so he used his sheild to knock the sword out of hiccups hand and was aout to pin him but hiccup desperatly grabbed for his sword but picked it up with his left hand and automaticly parraed thuggarys blow now thuggary was realy annoyed not only was he not beating hiccup yet but now hiccup was figting left handed and still doing pretty well but this was new to hiccup to as he just realised that he was left handed and now that he had the upper hand it was thuggary getting the cutts.

now thuggary was furious and threw one of his fire grenades which burst into flames on impact covering hiccup in nightmare fire, hiccups skin that was exposed to the fire automaticly changed to the black night fury scales which made it look like he was burning but hiccup casualy tossed awway is ruined sheild and walked up to thuggary who was to shocked y the lack of pain to do anything, hiccup knowed the axe and sheild out of his hands and pinned him pointing hi sword at thuggarys neck.

"do you submit"

"uhh yeah.. sure i submit"
122112.title: axes

1221122.content:
"beeting a seedragonous giganticus maximous is one thing but walikng through fire like that i another" said mogadon as everyone had gathered to hear what this amazng warior had to say

"here me now my actions are not as important as what you as a village decide right now, dragons are the way forwards they were a threat but not anymore but do not be blind there are still threats such as the romans and other seadragonous giganticus maximi and the best way to defend ourselves from these is to form an aiance with the dragons"
1221122.title: they suspect him t be a god or something

12211221.content: a celebration donimated the rest of the day for the conflict threatening to tear the meathead islands apart had been resolved and nobody was more pleased by this than moagaon who decided to honor hiccup and toothless with a gift
12211221.title: they agree

122112212.content:
hiccups sword was dammaged in the fight and toothless did not even have a sword anyway

"well if you are as fireproof as you seem it only makes sense that ou have swords to match, these were carved from the teeth of that monster you killed" they were beautiful swords the blades were a bright white with veins of glowing green and the hilts were made of the indestructible golden shells of the fire dragons and decorated with emeralds. they thanked mogadon for these gifts and also picke up some ther suplies including black cloakes so that they could hide their wings and pleanty of food.
122112212.title: new swords

1221122122.content: barley a year later all the islands were alied with the dragons and the two had he blood of evey known species of dragon and were thouroly equiped so it was time to go back to birk
1221122122.title: time skip

12211221221.content:
hiccup and toothless assembled a pack of terrors to gather the teens and their parents and dragons and stoic and his dragons and bring them to the old campsite where they took the rescued grown ups after they were banished the first time.

"hi guys whats up?"

"hiccup!"

"wait whos this.. and wheres toothles?"

"well this is toothless, both him and i can change to any dragon or a human form"

"wait isnt that dragon skin clothing?!"

"oh its from us shedding our skin, no death involved" as hiccup was wearing a nightmare skin cape which concealed his nightmare wings and nadder trousers, zippleback shirt and gronkle vest and boots, toothless was dressed similarly but they had diffrent colours.

"so is the village ready for us yet, or is something wrong?"
12211221221.title: meet others n secret first

122112212211.content:
"ummm theres something that you should know"

"what, are the village still going on about u being in leuge with loki?"
122112212211.title: somethings wrong

1221122122111.content:
"they dont talk about it as much but their attitudes are still the same"

"so what do we go back into waiting?!"
1221122122111.title: yes

12211221221112.content:
"just because they dont like you does not mean they have a right to keep you out of your home hiccup"

"so what we are going to live here by force?"

"well you could do that or you could just disgise yourself"
12211221221112.title: no

122112212211122.content: "ok toothless should we be both dragons, both humans or a mix"
122112212211122.title: discuises

1221122122111221.content: both humans or both dragons
1221122122111221.title: the same

12211221221112212.content:
"both dragons it is then"

"hey yeah it would be cool to have nightfurys in the village again"

"sure but is there anything else?"
12211221221112212.title: both dragons

122112212211122122.content: stoic has a new fife and son
122112212211122122.title: yes

1221122122112.content: was it a problem with hiccups and astrids relationship?
1221122122112.title: no

12211221221121.content:
"well you have been gone for a long time hiccup and the whole non human thing makes it hard for me to.."

"oh gods its not snotlout is it?"
12211221221121.title: yes

122112212211211.content:
"he was there for me!... he was there for me and you were not"

"well unless you hadnt noticed i wasnt there for you because i was a bit busy in saving the lives of thousand of dragons and humans!"

whilst the two argued everyone else including toothless and snotlout went over to the other side of the camp

"so you and astrid..."

"ummm yeah..."

"hmm.. i dont realy know how to react to that"

"how about not caring?"

"yeah that sounds fair so apart from those two is anything else wrong?"
122112212211211.title: yes

1221122122112112.content:
once hiccup and astrid stoped arguing hiccup stomped over to the other

"i trust you have some good news for me"

"the village is ready to accept you and there are no threats... and besides there are other fish in the sea you know"

"i thought tuffnut was going out with fishlegs"
1221122122112112.title: no

12211221221121121.content:
"nope they broke up about a month ago"

"oh are you hoping that fishlegs will be your boyfriend?" snotlout snickered but hiccup shot him a look that said ive had it up to here with you and snotloat looked away

"hmmm..." hiccup said considering the prospect of going out with tuffnut

"wow you are moving on fast" said astrid

"not as fast as you, you moved on before you even broke up with me!"

"well!" said stoick trying to lighten the mood "to celebrate how about a few rounds in the meed hall"

tuffnut grabs hiccup by the elbow
12211221221121121.title: not anymore

choices: go back to the events of that night
122112212211211211.content:
luckily the healing power of meed had made hiccup simply not care about astrid anymore and anyone in the hall was already too drunk to be afraid of the young shape shifters and eveything was a bit blurry in his memory but he realised that he was lying in his bed and he was not alone

"well good morning"

"hey there tuff i guess last night we..."

"yeah and lets just say that tail of yours is very talanted"
122112212211211211.title: she is interested

1221122122112112112.content:
hiccup wated no time in getting back to the old forge and adjusting his experimental weapon designs with a few tips and tricks from his travels and by mid morning he had more than half of his ideas built and tested including a working team engine which was extreemly advanced for a viking but the first use for it was to wind spring cells which he used as mechanical batteries for his new weapons such as the machine gun crossbow which he hoped might get people more into ranged weaponry and would certainly be effective against romans.

later he was walking with tuffnut and they happend to pass snotlout and astrid

"no hard feelings right astrid"

somehow saying that made him feal at peace with astrid but he was still anoyed at snot lout
1221122122112112112.title: later that day

12211221221121121121.content:
later in the great hall whiilst eating lunch hiccup was thinking about an excuse he could make to duel snotlout but snotlout sat down next to him and said

"hows it feal for the great and powerful shape shifter to have your girlfriend taken by a mere mortal like me" he said sarcasticly and everyone in earshot burst into laughter

"thats it, if you think your so great why not duel me"

"sure but i had best warn you i have got better since we last dueled how about one hour from now in the arena"

"fine by me but i will be using
12211221221121121121.title: duel him

122112212211211211211.content:
snotlout had apeared in his usual atire but holding a hammer and sheild. it had been a long time since hiccup used his powers in a fight hiccup had his sword in hand and didnt bother with a sheild as his sword was made of dragon parts and he could control it and put his powers into it, luckily tuff was not around so he didnt have to worry about frigtning her, he grew in size his wings and tail swirled around him his scales broadened and silvered and black spikes grew in all directions and his body lit up with a terrifying scarlet fire.

once he was ready snotlout looked a lot less confident but charged never the less hiccup shot a lightning bolt from one of his fingers which immidiatly stunned snotlout in a dance of spazams he then lifted his hand and snotlout was lifed into the air by some supernatural force.
122112212211211211211.title: my powers

choices: the people are scared of him
1221122122112112112111.content:
"OK,OK I'm sorry!"

"good" hiccup said dropping the little creature

"now if you don't mind i have lots to do at the forge"
1221122122112112112111.title: he submits

1221122122112112112112.content:
hiccup then shot more lightning at him to cause pain without long term damage,
eventually snotlout said "ok you win this round but i want a rematch"
1221122122112112112112.title: he dosnt

122112212211211212.content:
"umm hiccup, im not saying definetly no but i just got out of that relationship and well also the dragon thing is kind of umm..."

"its ok tuff, its your choice and besides there really are other fish in the sea"

"oh, do you have someone slse in mind?"
122112212211211212.title: she isnt

12211221221121122.content:
"well yes they are, i meant other, other" said ruffnut

"others on this island?"
12211221221121122.title: they still are

choices: well i might as well give it a try
122112212211211222.content:
"welllll.... no er at least not human fish, er girls" said ruffnut
"mabey you want to go steady with some sexy dragon girls"
122112212211211222.title: ye... no.

1221122122112112221.content: "well surley you met lots of girls in your travels"
1221122122112112221.title: nah not for me

122112212211212.content: "is it someone i know?"
122112212211212.title: no

info.brief_description: a realistic choice adventure based on httyd after the movie
info.description:
This is a story based on HTTYD after the movie, unlike most of my work this has nothing to do with vore, transformation ect allowed but no vore-erotic-fetish stuff, you are encouraged to add chapters but if it involves vore ect it will be removed.
Most interactive stories you choose what will eventually happen but this will be what i call a realistic choice story as in you can only make choices that you would make in real life e.g. you cannot give the choice die or survive you can only give choices like run away or stay and fight.
